sentences.sContent: She called him on his haughtiness.
Don't remember how to start, just remember in others in the laughter of my haughtiness of paint on words.
sentences.sContent_eng: Don't remember how to start, just remember in others in the laughter of my haughtiness of paint on words.
sentences.sCn: 不记得怎么开始，只记得在别人的笑声中我的傲慢中画上句话。

sentences.sContent: My parents laughed at my haughtiness.
sentences.sCn: 我父母笑我太傲慢固执。
